publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1961# Donald Gorrie: Social Enterprises and Procurement Policies—That the Parliament invites the Scottish Executive to hold discussions with local authorities and representatives of social enterprises to draw up guidelines on procurement policies that will enable social enterprises, small local companies and co-operatives to compete on a fair basis with larger firms for local authority contracts and will guide local authorities in assessing the real best value to the community when local social enterprises are given contracts to provide local services.

S2M-1961# Donald Gorrie: Social Enterprises and Procurement Policies—That the Parliament invites the Scottish Executive to hold discussions with local authorities and representatives of social enterprises to draw up guidelines on procurement policies that will enable social enterprises, small local companies and co-operatives to compete on a fair basis with larger firms for local authority contracts and will guide local authorities in assessing the real best value to the community when local social enterprises are given contracts to provide local services.
